    Babe Ruth

    Friends

    Mrs. Julia Ruth Stevens

    Hey guyz, i am babe's only living sibling since we were infants.
    We both grew up very poor and we were always looking for food on the streets.
    The great depression was when my family really struggled.
    Luckily, my big bro got some great paychecks from the game itself (baseball) XD!

    Waite Hoyt

    I am Babe's best bud in baseball. We played together for years on the Yankees, and even a few on the Red Sox.
    I am famous for having the most wins in Baseball World Series record.
    I also became an announcer for many teams, and I am known for my story telling when games get rained out.
